name: Pat C. TRUSIO, Appellant, v. Yvette KANE, Secretary of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, GAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: Pat C. TRUSIO, Appellant, v. Yvette KANE, Secretary of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 25th day of October, 1996, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Samuel J. Davis, John M. Purcell, Uniontown, for Pat C. Trusio.
Brian Gottlieb, Philadelphia, for Yvette Kane.
casebody.head_matter:
683 A.2d 873
Pat C. TRUSIO, Appellant, v. Yvette KANE, Secretary of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 7, 1996.
Decided Oct. 25, 1996.
Samuel J. Davis, John M. Purcell, Uniontown, for Pat C. Trusio.
Brian Gottlieb, Philadelphia, for Yvette Kane.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, GAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
